summary: This script adds 10 configurable hotkeys that can hold any spell.  They can have spells assigned to them in-game.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow]***NOTICE***
Please see this mod for a more full featured and up to date hotkeys mod:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3865[/color]

[u]-Description-[/u]
This script adds 10 hotkeys that can hold any spell, and function like a normal hotkey (left hand first then right hand).  They can be configured to any key by editing the .ini file, but by default they are F1 - F10.

What spell is in what hotkey can be assigned in-game.  While playing, press the Hotkey Assignment key (K by default) to toggle hotkey assignment.

The default spell for all hotkeys is Flames.  If you somehow attempt to equip a spell you don\'t know (by loading a save of another character, for example), the spell will not be equipped.

[u]-Requirements-[/u]
Requires Script Dragon, found here: http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1303320-rel-script-dragon/

[u]-Installation-[/u]
1. Install Script Dragon from the above link.
2. Place spellHotkeys.asi and spellHotkeys.ini into your root Skyrim folder, alongside TESV.exe. Not the Data folder.

[u]-Uninstalling-[/u]
Delete spellHotkeys.asi and spellHotkeys.ini.

[u]-Credit-[/u]
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon, and to NullCascade for help with a part of the script.
author: Eldiran
